item.title: Need good coder! fix this error! will give rs account!
item.dc:creator: @java_got_me_compiled java got me compiled
item.description:
@java_got_me_compiled wrote:

use my code i posted

[quote=“java got me compiled, post:3, topic:220066”]change to this

[code]} else if (i == 96) {
npcs.attacknpc = 97;
npcs.IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
npcs[97].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
AttackNPC(i);
} */
if (npcs.RandomWalk == true) {
npcs.getNextNPCMovement();
}
if (npcs.npcType == 81 || npcs.npcType == 397 || npcs.npcType == 1766 || npcs.npcType == 1767 || npcs.npcType == 1768)
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
} npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Moo nigga”;
}

              if (npcs.npcType == 1451) {
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
           }
              }
              
              if (npcs.npcType == 33) {
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
           }
              }
              
              if (npcs.npcType == 37) {
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdate = "Tele to tzhaar caves";
              }
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 28) { // dude to tele you from tzhaar - TEMP
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdate = "click me to tele to varrok";
           }
              }
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 535) { // fairy - white armour shop keper
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdate = "the dragon shop!!!";
              }
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdate = "magical armor here!!!";
              }
           
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 1201) {
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdate = "WE LOVE PROJECT X16! IT PWNS SO BAD!";
              }
           
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 1199) {
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdate = "WE LOVE PROJECT X16! IT PWNS SO BAD!";
              }
           
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 2301) {
              if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdate = "welcome to project x-16. server owner is  X 1 6";
              }
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 333) {            
              if (misc.random2(30) >= 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdate = "Welcome to x16!";
              }
           
              if (npcs.npcType == 222) {
              if (misc.random2(30) >= 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
              }   npcs.textUpdate = "Get your pwnage Barrows Armor here!!!"; {
              
           
              if (misc.random2(30) <= 1) {
              if (npcs.npcType == 111) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
           }      npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
              }   npcs.textUpdate = "Get Your Rares HERE!!";
                 
              
     
        }
        } else if (npcs.IsDead == true) {
           if (npcs.actionTimer == 0 && npcs.DeadApply == false && npcs.NeedRespawn == false) {
              if (npcs.npcType == 81 || npcs.npcType == 397 || npcs.npcType == 1766 || npcs.npcType == 1767 || npcs.npcType == 1768) {
                 npcs.animNumber = 0x03E; //cow dead
              } else if (npcs.npcType == 41) {
                 npcs.animNumber = 0x039; //chicken dead
              } else if (npcs.npcType == 87) {
                 npcs.animNumber = 0x08D; //rat dead
              }[/code][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need good coder! fix this error! will give rs account!
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

ok theres some kind of error in these few lines of code. whoever does it and it works gets a level 91 rs account.

} else if (i == 96) {
npcs[i].attacknpc = 97;
npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
npcs[97].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
AttackNPC(i);
} */
if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) {
npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768)
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
} npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo nigga”;
}

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
				}
					}
					
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 33) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
				}
					}
					
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 37) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to tzhaar caves";
					}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 28) { // dude to tele you from tzhaar - TEMP
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "click me to tele to varrok";
				}
					}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 535) { // fairy - white armour shop keper
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdate = "the dragon shop!!!";
					}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdate = "magical armor here!!!";
					}
				
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 1201) {
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdate = "WE LOVE PROJECT X16! IT PWNS SO BAD!";
					}
				
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 1199) {
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdate = "WE LOVE PROJECT X16! IT PWNS SO BAD!";
					}
				
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2301) {
					if (misc.random2(1) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to project x-16. server owner is  X 1 6";
					}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 333) {				
					if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to x16!"; 
					}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 222) {
					if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
					}	npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get your pwnage Barrows Armor here!!!"; {
					
				
					if (misc.random2(50) <= 1) {
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 111) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				}		npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
					}	npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Your Rares HERE!!";
						
					
		
			}
			} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) {
				if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == false && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) {
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x03E; //cow dead
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 41) {
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x039; //chicken dead
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 87) {
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x08D; //rat dead
					}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 08:24:29 PM[/size][hr]omg come on guys!!!!
